{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-14T21:28:57.000Z", "description": "Hello,

Greetings!

This is Akash Kumar from VBeyond Corp. We are a global recruitment company with specialization in of hiring of IT professionals. One of our clients is looking for Sr. Site Reliability Engineer
in 100% REMOTE



Title : Sr. Site Reliability Engineer

Location : 100% REMOTE

Full time



Job Description :


\u2022 Multi-Cloud operations and support following industry best practices (e.g. AWS Well-Architected Framework) and direct experience in at-scale administration, troubleshooting, and issue remediation in Public and Regulated Cloud Environments (AWS, AWS GovCloud, GCP, Azure, Azure-Jedi)
\u2022 3+ years CI/CD and Infrastructure Automation Experience with common platforms (Jenkins, Spinnaker, GitOps) and scripting (Terraform, Pulimi, CloudFormation, Ansible, Helm, Python)
\u2022 Self-motivated individual who is interested in expanding their knowledge and skillset while improving on processes, procedures, and approaches that benefit the organization
\u2022 A thoughtful individual who strives to find the best possible solutions to problems and the follow-through to see them from idea to execution
\u2022 Reliable team player, yet able to work independently, with strong interpersonal and communication skills.
\u2022 At least 2 years of hands-on experience in Docker & Kubernetes, familiarity with KOPS is an advantage
\u2022 Experience with Big Data domain technologies such as HDFS, S3, BSpark, BFlink, Presto, Kafka is essential, and deep knowledge is a strong advantage
\u2022 Team player, yet able to work independently, with interpersonal and communication skills.
I would appreciate if you could reach out on my below mentioned contact coordinates, should the position be of interest to you.
Have a great day ahead!
